name: Elemental Earth Dragon
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
senses: tremorsense 60 ft., blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 25

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The dragon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue of a dragon.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The dragon’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components. * At will: meld into stone, stone shape * 3/day: wall of stone * 1/day: plane shift

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shale and Stone Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon releases a 60-foot cone of sand and gravel. Creatures within the area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage plus 35 (10d6) bludgeoning damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature slain by this damage has its body pulverized; it can only be restored to life by true resurrection or wish.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
legendary.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
